operations.summary: List all the integrations configured for your client.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of integration, eg: hipchat

parameters.name: settings
parameters.description: The settings required by the integration, such as login and API token

operations.summary: Get details about a particular configured integration
Update the settings for an existing integration.

parameters.name: settings
parameters.description: The settings required by the integration, such as login and API token

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Either "enabled" or "disabled". There is a 3rd state, "errored", if something went wrong when we tried to send the notification, set the state back to "active" for us to try again.
